topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5490a7756368720f1b720300#post_5490a7756368720f1b720300
Seeya dude! Hope you and your Granddad will be a ok!


"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5490a6d763687210be540300#post_5490a6d763687210be540300
You know postal right?

Postal even though its almost the same, its COMPLETELY self aware of how stupid it is.

And so it makes fun of itself, _plus_ the game (In some ways) is actually going somewhere story wise even as stupid as it is.

And its all around stupidity so it (In my opinion) makes up for its complete weirdness cuz the game is supposed to be weird and dumb. the dude even breaks the forth wall.

Now imagine that same game, but serious and dark with no jokes, no self awareness, just death and gore with no objective. Just kill people.

Like I said I haven't seen the trailer but from what I'm hearing that's basically all hatred is.

I understand if you don't get why people don't like the game though so keep in mind I ain't trying to change your mind about it whatsoever.

topics.body:
"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5490aa596368725831b10200#post_5490aa596368725831b10200
Yes.

For an explanation, In an episode of Ultraseven, This guy is introduced sitting at a table and politely offering our hero a drink and a chat. (It had a very unsettling atmosphere considering what he had been doing the whole time and that they were talking about that)

In the episode of Ultra galaxy I just watched, He was also sitting at a table. Except it was in the middle of nowhere. (I guess it was supposed to be some sort of injoke)
